goal.en: The course will lay down the basic concepts and techniques of linear algebra needed for subsequent study. The goal of this course is to familiarize students with basic notions and results from linear algebra. At the end of this course students will be able to read, interpret, and use vocabulary, symbolism, and basic definitions from linear algebra and matrices. The students will be able to apply facts, formulas, and techniques learned in this course to other scientific fields.
goal.ch: Linear Algebra是一門基本數學，也是工程數學和某些專業科目的基礎。課程的呈現為理論與方法並重，並強調Linear Algebra的應用
